title: FS: T206 Griffith-Chase two name card - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Griffith-Chase two name card - SOLD
posts.post_content: Priced to sell!  GAI 2.5 of Griffith (Portrait) with Chase, N.Y. Amer. at the top.  Asking $300 delivered.  Would also consider trades, specifically preferring for EPDG or T206 SGC 40s.
bumping one more time and then into the vault.
